WorkItem.Description: Tried to make a mix of T6 and T7 items for my holy paladin. The program only acknowledge one of the set bonuses though. Used head, legs, chest and pauldrons from T7 and boots, bracers, gloves and belt from T6 ... As far as I know this is a valid thing to do and Rawr should count both 2 and 4 piece bonuses?

Comments.Message: Looks like our parsing for T6 set items broke... Edit the T6 items, and set the Set Name property. Then unequip and reequip them. We'll try to get that fixed in a future version.

Sorry about that guys. Re-download 2.1.9, and you'll have a full itemcache with locations for almost everything, and also fixes the set names for all the BC and pvp sets.

(You should see several of the models are v2.1.9.3 on the splash screen, after you re-download 2.1.9)
